values: hhmm an update on this lj would be nice eh? haha..i haven't been using this journal much, but using my xanga a lot more. i guess i'll start using both again :P

hhhmm..i haven't updated this in a while..it's called: laziness..haha..i've been updating my xanga just haven't been copying it all to this journal..it cause of those pictures i put up on xanga, im being lazy and not wanting to take the time to put them up on here, lol..but i will..in time :P  for right now just go to www.xanga.com/swtlovingurl..and if u dont have xanga and wanna comment, then comment on here :P  maybe later today or morrow i'll do it since it's all bleehhh outside cause of the rain, and i don't feel like doing much outside...byeeeee!

hhmm ok so my friend did highlights in my hair on mon night...the intent was to make it so that u could see dark brown streaks..success? nope! haha...my hair has never been jet black, more like brownish-black, but more on the black side...so anyways, attempted to dye it a darker brown..and i mean u can see brown but it the bottome part of my hair looks more brown than the top..hahaha...eehhh wutever, it looks fine...mebbe another time i'll make an attempt again, hehehe...if i didnt tell u u wouldnt be able to see the difference, cept maybe in the sun..o well! 

and last night i went to the pacer's & clipper's game!! woot woot!!   got to sit in the vip box seats baby! muahahaha :P  it was sooo cool..u get all this free food & drinks..yuummyyy..they had the same stuff as last time: chips, popcorn, fruit, wings, hot dogs, sandwiches...good stuff!  the game last nite was good..the clippers won..the stadium was kinda empty..but oooohh!!! u kno how they have those things where they pick someone and they hafta shoot the basketball from like way far back?  well, some guy actually got it in!!!!!   holy crap!! that was craaazzzzzzzyyyy..the crowd went crazy too..who woulda thought that someone would actually make a basket from so far back???  the guy was really surprised too and happy..so would i if i won a brand new car!!!  wow ... bet he went home happy..hahaha :P   all in all...twas a fun nite!

2 more days till december!!  the malls look so pretty w/ the christmas decorations..i loooove this time of the year, so festive!!    just the lights & decorations kinda lifts up my mood..one more month till 2005..wow, that's so crazy...so much has changed in this past year...so much..

i have actually done some of my christmas shopping..im quite surprised...haha cause usually im a big lagger when it comes to this...tryin to figure out wut to get some people, but some people i already know what to get. what do you want for christmas?  something i can afford that is, hahaha :P   which reminds me, i will soon put up my christmas list which is also my "wish list" for myself and hopefully one day i will be able to get myself all the things on there, haha   this year i'll be sure to put more stuff that is affordable by friends so that people don't really have to ask me this time what i want, it'll be on the list. 

hope everyone had a happy turkey day and stuffed their bellys!!    my thanksgiving weekend was alright..spent a lot of time with family and friends..which is always nice..  i   my family and friends!!

lan's party was aawweessommee possum!! :P  so many funny & interesting things happened that nite...i wont say all, if u werent at the party then i guess u wont kno what reaaaallly happened, haha  .. i dont have any pics to post cause i didn't have a camera, but once i get the pics from lan it'll be all good..it was one crazy night..i havent been drank since the graduation party in june..i remember most of the nite and had lotsa fun..i didnt get sick like i did last time, thank goodness..drank a good amount of alki..mmm..haha..drunk dialed jon yee w/ irene..haha..basically in a nutshell the nite was full of craziness, laughs, and debauchery (muahahahha)   a bunch of us gave lan a ps2 (the slim one), gta san andreas, and a collage w/ our pics and messages on it. thank u ferdinand for helping me collect the money, and larry for helping w/ the collage, and everyone else for everything else!  o yes & ppl for takin care of me at the party..gracias!  and lan, i hope u had a greeeeat bday and bday party..by the looks of things it looked like u had an AWESOME time! haha..i got to see ppl i havent seen in sooo long..saw liss, christine, mikie, harold, armondo..whoa!!   hehehe...

side note: when i went in to buy the ps2 & game..i felt like keepin it for myself..hahaha...bad rashmi!! :P

hmm..season 4 alias was good & interesting..thanks matt for letting me borrow it..they served as GREAT study breaks, hahaha :P 

ah yes..i saw "saw" .. get it? hahaha yah im a dork   that movie was actually okay...i thought it was gonna be really, really bloody and disgusting...just plain gross..but it turns out it wasn't as gory as i thought it would be..phew! thank goodness..i did get grossed out in a few parts & scared in some parts too...note to self: do not sit next to shirin during a scary movie..she will elbow u when there are scary parts which makes u more scared..haha..i think she did it to me a couple of times, but one of the times was one of those scary scenes where u get jumpy..and i got freaked out and double time cuz she elbowed me right then!! aahHhh!!   hahaha...im a big chicken when it comes to scary movies, but i still like watching them..im weird..hehe..but yah the movie was alright..it made u think..and u really never kno what is happening and can't really predict the ending..so if u haven't watched it, think about watching it maybe!

so the count down till my gmats is getting a heck of a lot closer..gosh, im starting to get nervous..i haven't felt this way since the SAT's but this time it's worse cause it's business school and it's a lot harder getting in than undergrad..wish me luck!!  14 days till doom..haha jk :P

o but im really excited..cuz im going to the yellowcard concert soon..i like their music...if anyone else wants to go let me know! kris i'll be thinkin of u when i go see them!! wish u were here to see them too w/ me!! *mwah*

im siiiicccck dang it!!!  arggghhh...it must be from sat nite..phooey!  oh well time for the drugs...bring on the drugs yo! haha..

u kno what bugs? is when people say they'll do something and then they don't...or say they'll do one thing, but do another..rawwwrr..don't do that ppl!!!! 

some weird stuff has been happening lately...enuff said..eehh..

this is gonna be a random post...check out some of these pickup lines..do ppl actually use these? some of them are amusing..but i'd hope ppl don't really use them!! 

* Hey baby, wanna play lion? OK. You go kneel right there and I'll throw you my meat.

* Oh, you're a bird watcher....(Whip out your unit and ask) Well, would you take this for a swallow?

* Are you going to the party tonight (what party?) The one in your mouth, everybody's cumming. 

* love is a sensation; caused by a temptation; to feel penetration; a guy sticks his location; in a girl's destination; to increase the population; for the next generation; did you get my explanation; or do you need a demonstration? 

hahahahahaha??  ~ knock urself out folks!

the other day i burned myself..ouch!  i was making somethin in the oven and i went to take my hand out and it touched the top of the oven (the big kind)...and i was like noOOoo..so now i have this gross burn mark on my hand, arggh!    

this past weekend was coooooll....studied a lot..but also had some fun..the perfect combination..went to a family friend's house on fri evening..and celebrated her bday..that was an interesting night...later on that nite, late late at nite hung out a lil..and went to bed kinda late..eh

saturday i studied pretty much ALL day...oye..that wasn't really that fun..and spent a couple hrs on the phone w/ court tryin to convince me to go to masquerade ball last nite, haha..after several attempts she finally convinced me...got ready around 8, went to eat w/ a friend, and then headed on to the ball...on the HORNBLOWER :P it was fun...got to see a loootta ppl from uci cki that i haven't seen in a really long time, along w/ ppl from other clubs too..saw micha..stephanie hsu..ryan..lotsa ppl..the stars were so pretty and there were several shooting stars!!!! soooo coool!  didn't get back home till 4:30 in the morning..craziness i tell ya...hehehe..

today i didn't wake up till 2pm, hahaha..lazy bum right here, lol!  hung out a lil..n then studied..now im just waitin to see if i'll be doin anything tonite..yay?? :P

thank gawwdd it's friday!!!! whoo hooo!! this past week i've basically spent all day working and then studying like a mofo...and working out..all week i come home, change work out, come back eat dinner and the study for a good 5-6 hrs studying...lack of sleep alongside all this, haha...im getting old yo..i don't think i can handle the 4-5 hrs of sleep a nite nemore..mebbe cuz i havent been use to that anymore :P  

im happy tho cuz i took another practice test, on the comp, since that's how i hafta em for real..and i got a 760!!!! whoo hoo!!!!  it's outta 800, so i was happy w/ that practice score...i got 3 more week to practice, maintain or increase that score..the real thing ur score always seems to go down a lil cuz ur nervous and all..but bleh, i hope i'll be fine..after these are over it's time to study for the gre's...but im not as worried bout those, since they are so similar to the sat's...boo to takin 2 tests tho, but guess i hafta since i want 2 master's degrees..thankfully i can do them together so it won't be as long   

u kno what's funny..so i get cosmo magazine right? and this past year they started makin their magazine bindings like maxim..where on maxim each month u get it and put it in order there is a girl on the side, so on cosmo when u put em together there is a hooott guy, lol!  but yah the funny thing is that cosmo missed one of my issues so my hot boy on the mag is missin somethin, hahaha..and then they messed up the order of the guy's face..HAHAHA..oops huh?

so far my week has been alright, seeing that today is only tues..haha

saturday nite i went w/ my parents for a little get together thingie to celebrate our indian new year...that was oooookay..and then i left early and headed on to bri's apt..where me, him, and matt watched 2 episodes of lost (matt brought em over)...interesting show..blood, ew!  after that we played our good ol game on munckin!! dang we get really competitive when we play that..haha..i won the first game we played, bri won the 2nd game we played...aww poor matt, still has yet to win!! :P  after that umm i think we watched a lil tv and that was that...didn't go to bed till 4am that nite or sun early morning i should say...was chatting online and was using the video option thingie on aim..interesting stuff yo

sunday i worked out! yay!!...went to a family friend's place for a few hours...got to see ajay & sameera..haven't really seen them in a while, so it was kewl...after that i studied..booo, not so fun...but theeeeeeenn...my girlfriend finally came down to visit me!!!!!!  she's my hot sexy lesbian lover  hahaha...went to dinner w/ court at friday's..chit chatted, caught up on some gossip  ... talked about boys..haha..whoo hoo for boys...and then went to d&b's w/ her and linda...we chatted there too & got a drink..yes just one...im not an alki contrary to popular belief..haha...after that headed back home and had a slumber party!!!! hahaha..not really..but court slept over...o yah..talked in a chat room w/ a bunch of uci cki'ers and lan :P ... interesting conversations in there, kinda lost after a while..but oohh well..

monday took cort to the mall but didn't really buy anything...she bought some stuff for her bro..and then that was the end of the gf trip *sniff* ... i wasn't feeling too well yesterday so after coming home i slept for a while..it wasn't that good kinda sleep tho, it was the on and off again sleep...o yah i didn't hafta go in to work that day, haha, which worked out well!  so napped for a lil while..and then linda came over and we went shopppinnngg..yep, again..i actually bought stuff, but not really...bought some stuff at victoria's secret cuz i had some credit left from there..and then bought 3 shirts at aeropostale but i returned 2 other things which were 20 bucks each and these shirts were only 4 bucks each..so REALLY i didn't actually spend anything!after shopping, we went to eat at denny's...i think friday's or denny's has become mine and linda's eating joint, haha 

today - tuesday was same ol, same ol...worked out, chatted online a lil..and then it was time for mary's surprise bday dinner!!!! yiippeee!!  it was kewl, cuz shirin went to pick her up and then came to the restaurant and mary was blindfolded, muahahaha :P  but smartie pants knew where we were but didn't kno there were other ppl besides shirin there, hahaa..sneaaakkky!!  it was a fun nite!  got to see some ppl that i haven't seen for a while like shirin...saw mary last week, haha..and then ppl i havent seen since freakin hs!! .. like chris and michelle...wowza!!  it was like a mini RB reunion! haha..took some pics, sang happy bday, and opened gifts..it was fun!!  happy early bday miss mary liu!! oooOo and i got season 3 ALIAS, thanks matt for lettin me borrow it!!

went to eat at island's last nite..yummy!!!  i haven't eaten there for a while now..ahh good ol islands!! hehe...after that i went to see the incredibles ..the movie was really funny!  it was better than i thought it'd be. loads of laughs   go see it if u haven't yet!  after the movie went to get some boooobbbaa!  i had a stawberry mango w/ strawberry boba, haha...it was really good..it was a nice friday night  

today i have to do some family stuff later on in the afternoon and then that's it..nothing else planned as of yet. hopefully i will be doing something later on, hehe...besides studying that is of course...boo, studying in the inevitable..but what can you do..and then tomorrow night court will HOPEFULLY be coming to sd, yaaaaaaaaayyyyyyyyy!!!!!!  im excited!! 

oke..im going back to studying..i'm getting yelled at by someone, haha

halloooh november!! woooww...in another 2 months it'll be 2005!!!!  can you believe it?!  i sure can't...work is work...and i'll be starting school again in the spring...just when u think ur done with school, noooo..haha..it's okay, i miss school sorta and i'll be in school for a good amount of time starting in january..i'd say a good 4-5 years...alongside work..i know it sounds just SO exciting!  my once again n0-life routine will start again..it's gonna be work 40 hrs a week, classes, and gym..and then of course fitting time in to hang out & such.  

i like this time of the year cuz november means it's almost christmas time and i loooove christmas time!! it's so pretty around christmas time with all the decorations and cute stuff. and i like going shopping at malls that are decorated all nice, puts you in the christmas spirit..what i don't like are long lines at the malls and b*tchy customers!! rawwrr  ... the only thing about this time of year is that it gets hecka expensive!!  birthdays as there are the rest of the year but birthdays around this time means double the money, cause it's christmas time tooooo...so i need money to buy christmas presents & birthday presents, wowzers..i better save! :P  i should start thinkin about what to get people starting sometime soon..cause knowing me it'll take me till christmas to know exactly what i want to get people..hehe..

oke well that was a lovely study break...im off to the gym to work out my fat ass & and then back to studying...i only got a month left, acK!  i feel the streeeesssssss, it's cooooomiiiiiiiiinggggggg, nooOooooooo!!!!!

HAPPY HALLOWEEEEEEEENNNNNN everyone!!!!  

good ol halloween...haha..gives girls an excuse to dress hecka skanky & not get crap for dressing that way..laungerie and what not...last nite i went clubbing in downtown sd. some people have some very creative minds w/ the costumes they came up with...clever, clever..while we were waiting in line to get in the club we saw a guy that was dressed up as that one machine monster thingie from spider man 2...holy crap, that was crazy..he had to wake in the street and make sure he wasn't hitting people, hahaha   i wanted to take a picture with him, but he was too popular, so didn't get a chance...saw a lot of ppl dressed up as lil kim..caucasian lil kims...hhmmm    haha...haha there was this one guy who had a really funny costume but u had to be there to get the full visualization..we didn't get into the club till sorta late, but at least we got it in!  oh which brings me to the getting in actually..we get to the bouncer and he freaking looks at my ID for a good 2-3 minutes..acK!  he kept looking at the back, the front, sideways, what not..and then made me tell him the info on my driver's license, and then he looked at my eyes and then told me to smile for him..dooooodd, i was just thinkin "just lemme in, im freakin over 21 for goodness sake!!"  arrggh, that always happens to me anywhere u need to have an ID to do something..cuz dammit i don't look even 21..rrawwwrr...

the clubbing experience itself was interesting..hahaha..as always i always leave the club w/ a lot of interesting experiences and my friend's getting good laughs outta the stuff that happens to me...in a nutshell i was approached by a bunch of not so attractive guys, guys that wouldn't leave alone when i clearly didn't want to dance with them, guys that feel the need to pass by you and touch ur waist and then the ass..yes the ass  ... when they very well can just get by, by just simply not touching you or the shoulder...gosh!  o then there were the guys that like to bump and grind up against you like no other, grabbing u & touching u...whoo don't u jus love that?!?!  hahaha..o and then there are those that gotta take to u like "hey baby, wanna dance?" or "hey ___ (fill in whatever ur costume was) let's dance." and when u tell em ur w/ someone else, then they gotta respond w/ "well now ur w/ me." uuhh *gag* hahaha...oh and get this, there was a guy that was dancing w/ some girl and then grabbed my arm and smiled at me and i was thinking, "uuuhhh helloo ur dancing w/ another girl and ur smilin & flirtin w/ me?!? wth?!"    there were several other stories from last nite, but those were some of em..there were lotta girls dressed up as nurses, but they were tryin to be sexy nurses but then there dress didnt even look sexy..eh..and then there were lots of girls w/ wings sorta costumes..i was a butterfly, yay!  i had my tank top, skirt w/ butterflies (and i remembered last nite why i don't wear a skirt to a club anymore)..and i actually wore make up..wow i kno, it's a shocker..haha..i like my wings, but they got in the way a lot..haha..the only good thing was that it sort of prevented guys from comin up from behind me, altho the wings got flattened out a thru the nite cuz it didn't prevent guys from coming up behind me as well as i had thought it would...and had guys just touchin my wings as a starter for conversation...ah yes and the fair share of people spilling their drinks on me...how nice..that is it a nutshell pretty much..i could go more in detail about each one, but i'd prefer not to here..hehehe..lovely ain't it?

aww i feel the looovee    hahaha ... funny & clever might i add  

eklipse2: g'nite rash...go to bed
eklipse2: with me
eklipse2:  :)

boo the weekend is almost over..the weekends always seem to go by fast..sucks!  my weekend was alrighty...friday i went to sdsu for an indian thing *gasp* yeah i went to an indian thing, hahaha...i know it's quite shocking, haha...went to a dance called "garba."  it was fun even tho at first i didn't know how to do the dance, but i caught on...man it's freaking tiring...i can club dance for 3-4 hours straight but 10-15 mins of this i was thinkin it was tiring, hahaha...so many hoochie indians there that nite, hahahaa...i think indian girls like going to those because it's the only time their mom's don't care that their tummies are showing..a good portion of it too..hahaha...the one time their parents don't tell them to cover up and not show even the smallest amount of skin, hahaha...but here they can go all out and wear the indian clothes which show skin...funny i tell ya...and then when we wear american clothes oh heck no, it's like "cover that up!!"  hahaha...saturday i took my sissy to lunch at redbrick pizza, mmMmmm, and then i dragged her to do my errands (returns & such) hahaha...i needed company!  and later at nite went to watch the grudge...acK!!!!  i got freaked out a lot!  hahaha...that movie keeps u on ur toes a lot so it's scary cause u know something is gonna happen the entire movie but don't know what and then it's BAAAAAMMMMMMM!!!!!!  AHHhhhhhhhh..hehehehe..the movie was soooo packed toO!!  wow, i didn't think that many ppl would go see it since it had bad reviews. we had to sit in the front rows, ewww...i think that made it scary cause when something scary happened it was right in front of you, haha...i saw the japanese version a few months back and i think this was scarier cause in the jap version u're paying attention to the subtitles as well as what's going on, but this one you know english so you're paying attention to the movie completely...after the movie went to friday's...foOoooooooddd, yum yum!!    sunday...hhmmmm not doing anything today really...oke doke..ta ta!!!

hola amigos..que pasa?  oOoo i remember my spanish..haha..

wow the rain for this past week has put quite a damper on a few things..hhmm oh well..hehe..i like the rain but don't like driving in it! ack! so many accidents, scary   i wanted to rain in it and play, but nobody to do it with..boo!!  

ah yes, finally went to cheesecake factory last night, whooo hoooooo!!!!!!  that was something that was long overdue, since it was planned a few weeks back..haha..luckily it wasn't raining really last night, but it was cooldd...as usual ate good food there, shared a cheescake..and had leftovers which came in handy for lunch today.  

the highlight of my day: jon drunk dialing me at 2:45 this afternoon...HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA...wait...pUAhahahahahahahahahahaha..i think i got all it outta my system...kee kee..that was hilarious..so he told me he was gonna drunk dial me but at 2pm, but i didn't get a call from him till a lil later and i was at a meeting, boo..so my cell phone voicemail had the luck of hearing him..funny boy..hahaha and then i heard the voicemail and i laughed to myself (haha lame i know but what kinda weird would i look like busting out in laughter by myself?) hahaha..thanks jon! haha ... o yeah and drinking in afternoon..i don't think i've ever done that..but that's so cool to have an early work holiday party w/ open bar...tiiitteee!  sorry i didn't call back tho, i couldn't and i figured you were probs too busy having fun there and didn't wanna bother you..haha..but i'll call you sometime...we're even..you drunk dialed me and i've drunk dialed you..altho i think the time i drunk dialed was far more entertaining

attention!! **i got a new cell phone this past weekend!! ... yes that's right..no more semi-broken cell phone, haha ... and yep, it's an 858 area code ... i've given it out to some people already, but if u want it you have to ask me for it
hahaha i thought these were funny tshirts :P (puahahaha..or you can have it say "...in china," "...in thailand," etc..)

oOOoo so im a romantic kiss..hehehe ... "lying in bed after making love and just doing whatever."  how sexxxyy!!! haha..the other types of kisses you could be were: playful kiss, tender kiss, lesbian kiss, and goodbye kiss..i like mine!

Take the quiz: "What Kinda Kiss R U?"

Romantic Kiss
Lying in bed after making love and just doing whatever.

Doesnt matter much what you will
Cuz L'm leaving you now anyway

Gonna have some fun for a change
and you cant do a thing to make me stay

Gonna throw away ur pictures and the ring
cuz they dont mean a single thing

I just wanna have some fun with someone
bye bye baby..bye bye

Kissing you goodbye
starting a new life
now I know I'm finally done and through with you

You're not the one who can give me all
kissing you goodbye, no more tears to dry
now i know exactly what i wanna do in my life

You wont be there cuz we have nothing more to share

gosh dang it...my stupid cell phone broke this evening!!!    greaattt..i have the motorola flip phone, the 722i, the one i've had for a year and a half now..and it broke, gah!  only on one end where you open it..on the swively part..so i basically can't use it unless i use my ear piece now...how nice, rawr   i guess i really need to go pick a new phone out sometime this week or weekend..since i've been putting it off since may when i contract ended, haha..time to go cell phone shopping this weekend i guess since i don't really have time during the week to go do it..any suggestions on phones? service?  i have tmobile right now..so im thinking stick with tmobile or switch to verizon..and phones i think i want a flippy one again, but if there are kewler non-flippys that's fine too...and YES im gonna switch the phone number and it'll be a 858 area code (finally huh?!) hahaha..no more 949 *sniff*  hehe..people keep asking why i still have my irvine area code and not the sd one..it's called laziness 

so as soon as i get that new phone & new number..ask you shall receive!!! or else tough luck, you aren't getting it..muahahahaha

oke dokes folks...imma post   it's gonna be a lOng one!

thursday i had work..woot woot..afterwards there was a little "party" for work at Seaport Village, how exciting!?!  almost everyone ended up being busy that night, boo..matt had a midterm the next morning, brian had to stay in lab till late (missed out on free alki & free food bri!), lan wasn't getting off work till later so he couldn't come down either..but luckily reina & her friend from h.s. were free, so i took them as my guests!    we had mucho fun & our tummies were satisfied as well at the end, lol...there was soooooo much freaking food at this festavil thingie..lemme see, there was hot dogs, hamburgers, pizza (even tho we didn't see it), sushi, trip tip steak, teriyaki salmon, rice, tacos, carne asada, empanadas, shrimp..i think there was more (i can't remember)...we made our way around to all the food tables around the marina area...haha..we sampled a lil bit of everything..and then there were free drinks, yes alcoholic ones too, ooOooo!    we had a white elephant daiquiri, strawberry margarita, and then a tequila sunrise..mmm they were alright, cept i could taste the alki in the first and 3rd one too much..wheeewww, where is my tolerance going? hahaha...reina and her friend went on the bunji jump thingie where u bounce in the air n stuff, but i passed cause i was so full i didn't wanna be jumpin and flippin..hehe..but it was fun watching them do it, hahaha..oohh and then of course desert!!!!! yummyyyyyy...they had white choclate and milk choclate and then u could dip strawberries, mangos, grapes, or bananas into it...oohhhh soooo good!!  that was a fun night!!

friday was same ol, same ol..later on at night went to ikea to do some "browse shopping" haha...i didn't buy anything cuz i wanted to wait till the weekend to buy stuff since it'd be tax free..so i just browsed..hehe..then went to fashion valley and shopped a little, but my trend of browse shopping carried on, whew! hehehe...after shopping and in between waitin for the movie we wanted to see, ate a cinnabon (oohh so goood too!! haha..i hadn't had one in forever!)...ended up watching shark tale..i liked the movie, i thought it was rather cute..then since we hadn't had dinner, we headed on to friday's for happy hour...good ol happy hour eh? heheh..shared a meal and an appetizer and called it a night...fun stuff yo!

saturday spent basically all day cleaning out my closests..wowzers, i had a whole lotta crap from high school still in there..old magazines, even my h.s. newspapers, hahaha..got rid of a lot of junk..TRIED to throw away some old clothes so that i have room for all the new ones i've been getting (shame on me..i know)...my room looks cleaner and the closets look emptier..not the clothes portion, hahaha..but everything else...and then went to north county to do shopping..actually had to return something but ended up buying things at aeropostale..they have a huuuuuuge sale!!! 50% off so many cute things!...i think the cheapest things they had there was a shirt for .99 cents! and it wasn't bad looking, kinda cute..and mini skirts for 3 bucks!!! haha...good deal huh!? soo u can guess what kinda damage i did their that day    .. later that night i watched love don't cost a thing...mmm not that great of a movie, oh well..kee kee

sunday ran a bunch of errands..helped out the parents with some stuff..later on that night straighted my hair..yes, finally got rid of the stupid perm i had done at the end of my 3rd year in college...hahaha..oh how i missed my naturally straight hair..i hope this straightening stuff i used lasts a while..hehe..

monday (today) same stuff as usual..forgot the bank was closed today and went to deposit my paycheck..doh!  went to north county again with a friend..went to eat a lil somethin afterwards..and watched fighting temptations..ehhh it was alrighty...i got the chappelle's show - season 1 - uncensored!! ooOooo    his shows are funnnyyy..hehe
i have pictures up on my xanga!..u hafta go there to look at em, sorry!

last week was sort of an emotional time for me & my family..well my mom more so..last tuesday early morning we got a call informing us that my uncle had passed away...i was in shock, although i know i probably shouldn't have been since we knew had cancer for the past 8-10 months. i'm really glad my mom was able to go see him if not all of us. it was ironic because my mom got back on monday afternoon and he passed away early morning Tuesday. It's like he wanted to see my mom one last time before leaving us. the dr. told my mom that he had never seen anyone with the will power to live, as he had seen in my uncle. i'm going to miss my uncle a lot and a lot of tears were shed that morning.  but he's probably in a better place now & it's probably for the best rather than him suffering and being in misery.  

i haven't really been doing all that much lately...same old, same old..you know..i'm still debating whether or not to apply to ucsd's mba program for fall 2005..it'll be the first class there..we'll see..i have a little bit of time..i already filled out the app i just have to get everything together. oh yeah, i'm registering to take calculus  for january..but just at a community college..i was looking into the pre-reqs for business schools & some of them need a year of calc which i don't have..so i'm going to take that in january. i don't really want to spend money on taking it through ucsd extension, so i'm going to be cheap and take it at miramar or something. wish me luck cuz i suck at calc! haha..i can do stats but not calc...

i was talking to one of my friends today and he was telling me how he really hates it when people don't return calls or messages..and i think that is one of my biggest pet peeves..cuz for me, it's obvious if someone calls you they want to talk to you or something or another or else they wouldn't have called..and then when you don't call them back, it just seems rude...it doesn't take long to pick up the phone and return someone's call..if u dont have time to talk to them then at least tell them you're returning their call, but you can't really talk right now & that you'll call them when get the chance..at least your acknowledging the phone call..sheesh people!! 
 
******

So about 10 months ago we got news that my uncle in India was dianosed with cancer.. my mom went to go see her brother a week or so after she found out, seeing that the doctor's had told her it could be a matter of months before he passes away. Last week, 10 months later, we get news that it could be a matter of days before he passes away.  So, today my mom left for India to go visit him, which could be very likely the last time she sees him..my mom is this uncle's favorite out of all her siblings and she has 5..and he is my favorite uncle as well as i am his favorite niece...i'm really miss him!!!  It sucks because I haven't seen him in 5 years, because I haven't been back there since after I graduated college..the time my parents did go, I had an internship during the summer which I couldn't take time away from to go..boy do I regret that now..I wanted to go with my mom, but we just don't have enough money for the both of us to go.  I guess I will have to be content with being there in spirit. Not being able to do anything is the hard part..know that I all I can do is sit back and do nothing...is well, hard..As for my uncle, I guess he'll be going to a better place..that's all I can really tell myself to make myself feel a little better..Cancer...I really wish there was a cure for all types of it..so many people die from the different types of cancers out there..sad, sad, sad... 

Just typing this brings back memories of my uncle and brings tears to my eyes *sniff*

o man..so last night eileen & i went to cold stone ice-cream..and we each got a gotta have it size...biiigg mistake, ack!!  i've been to cold stone before, and usually get the love it or like it size..but since we had a buy one get one free coupon, we got the big one..o lordie..first off i got it in a waffle bowl..and so on our way to blockbuster, which isn't even far, like 1 min or 2 drive..eileen had to hold my ice-cream, and it managed to drip and a lil fell on her lap..ew..we got out and were trying to eat as much as we could so it'd freakin stop dripping!! we rented Freaky Friday (yah i kno, kids movie but hush!)..went back to my place and watched it and STRUGGLED to eat out dang ice-cream..my sister ate some of mine, but this was seriously a struggle..i managed to finish mine, eileen did not..watched the movie (it was good, i liked it)..and then felt extremely sick...from the ice-cream..booo!!    waaaaayy too much ice-cream for rashmi..and theenn i couldn't fall asleep, probably cuz i had too much sugar..and theenn i felt guilty for eating that much cuz of all the working out i've been doing..dammit!!    so im not doing that again..but yeah, that ice-cream made me feel not so good overall..same with eileen..i wish i had a picture of how much ice-cream was in my cone thing...it was HUUUGEEEE!!  i think i had my supply of ice-cream for a good month.hehe

mmmm let's see..my take on friendship: 

> it's a 2 way thing: don't expect me to make all the effort, after all it's a type of relationship..and a relationship requires two people making the effort.

> don't expect to throw away the friendship with me for lame reasons and then come back for it anytime you want..that isn't happening!!!   oh and on top of that pretending that you didn't do anything and nothing happened (oohhh i really can't stand that!)

> if you threw it away once it makes me wonder how much you really cared about the friendship in the first place

> i strongly dislike people who throw away friendships!!!  good, genuine friends are hard to come by...we should all know that by now!! and just throwing it away...ugghhh..it irks me!!

(my favorite color!)..n a soft blanket..so comfy, yay!  then headed to lan & patrick's apt..lan's new one, patrick's old..hehe..the place is nice, the first thing i saw when i saw lan's room was his bed, so BIG and comfy!!!!!!!! hahaha...it was cool cuz he had painted his room blue, so it looked different than just an ordinary white room..hehe..of course wut would a trip to irvine be w/o being violated by patrick???   LOL...so got hit in the boobies like 5-7 times..i think one boob got more love than the other, hahahha..o well   o yaahhh..looked at lan's playboy magazine, hahaha..interesting conversations were had over that and more..hahaha..& i supposedly know a lot about kama sutra, riiiiiiiighhhht..haha..ooOoo oOoo and THEN lan gave me my birthday gift...GUESS WHAT IT WAS?!?!?! .... an ACOUSTIC GUITAR!!!!!  ommgggg!!! i was sooooo HAPPPYYYYYYYYY, aiEEeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!!!!!!!  i think that made my day/night..i've wanted one for so so so long and now i actually got one!! i don't know how much to thank you lan, seriously..YOU ARE THE BESTEST!!!!! *mwaH!!!!!!!!!!!!!* ..i think that has got to be the best present i got for my birthday this year and maybe even all the years.  i evidently better have learned how to play a song by the time i see him next..anyone care to help me out!!? lol..i'll put up a picture of the guitar later on..happy happy happy!!!      i lubba lan (haha not in that way of course but in a friend way, hahaha..and not just for the gift but for always being there for me & always being my friend)

yesterday was another ordinary day..a fun filled day of working..and then in the evening i went out to dinner w/ the 3 musketeers plus mike h. & christie. we went to todai in mission valley...twas yummy...pricey but good..it was worth the money compared to the brazillian bbq place we went to a couple months back. i ate a plate of california rolls & some other type of sushi..some chicken salad, some ramen, beef bbq, fruit, green tea ice-cream (!!!)...i loooove green tea ice-cream!   had a couple other desserts..the best part of dinner was watching bri & mike compete at who could eat the most cream puffs..hahahahaha freakin hilarious i tell you!  u had to be there, it was great..i think the final score was brian 13 and mike 19..that is nasty yo..i had one and that was enough for me...but yah funny, hehe :P  later on we went back to bri's and played munchkin again. it was kewl, we played w/ more ppl this time so it made it more interesting. after that we played regular card games..made up a few on our own (haha), played go fish, old maid, some form of poker..and then played crazy 8's..this game lasted foooreeeveerrr...it was funny..mike had a huge laugh attack, haha..cuz it was just me & him tryin to win since everyone else had got out already..but neither of us was able to win and since it kept going for such a long time we just called it quits since bri had to go back to lab..wut a good night filled with laughter

so tonight darrell made me realize i really ought to update more than once a month..haha..this is for u yo! :P  so here is the re-cap of the past 2 weeks or so.. 

week of August 1st - August 7th

for most of the week it was pretty much working till 6 or 7:30 each night, and going to the gym..been eating lunch w/ a friend (someone i haven't seen much of for a lil bit) the past week or so since we work close by..it's always good to have a lunch eating partner or else sometimes it gets sorta lonely..sniff, sniff..hehe..hung out w/ him two of those nites..watched some movies at his apt w/ his roomies..ate dinner, or more like cooked it..good times, good times..o yes & eileen came to visit me at work & we went to lunch at my company cafeteria, they have some good food!! 

friday night went to matt's place in RB and watched the japanese version of the grudge, eeek!    yaaah...n then that was me, mike h, kristine & matt (o yah and we ate lasagna..mMMm)...n then brian and christie came over and we started drinking, cuz bri is the lush of the grp! haha   we were doing our competition thingie again..so started off w/ a beer (which i dont like but drank anyways cuz im a sport, haha)..then took a shot of bicardi O...whOo WhEeee..haha..took another i think..n then started to play cranium..interesting game, especially when u play w/ us!  after that we had some margaritas made by mike, and just chilled...drank some smirnoff twist, and a martini made by matt...and then started playing LIFE..yes LIFE..hahaha..i haven't played that game in ages, and this one wasn't the one i played when i was small..but wutever..haha..we all had buzzes going, no drunk ppl yet but toward the end of the life game bri was pretty much drunk..hahahhaha funny..brian drunk is funny :P   ended the nite by just watching a lil tv and talking..twas a fun nite!!

saturday nite was clubbing night!! yeeeessss clubbing..we went to on broadway..yay!  the club was alright, not as great as i had heard it was..i actually didn't like this clubbing experience as much as my other ones, but that's alright..this one is extra special cuz matt went...he was a clubbing virgin prior to this..we clubbing de-virgnized him!!!!!   hahahaha..and matt called me a pimp that nite..har har har..was an exciting night to say the least..next time no on broadway, but if neone wants to go let me know!!

sunday went to Friday's for Happy Hour..delicious!! kee kee ... o yah and went shopping earlier that day..but good job me i didn't buy anything and actually returned stuff, WoW i'm so proud of myself, haha..

wednesday was a sad, sad night..*sniff*  why u ask?..cuz it was the last night i was gonna see one of my really close friends for a good 4 months!! aCkkk!! it was major sadness..oh oops, my close friend's name is kristine by the way, haha...so that night i went over to her house and watched sex & the city with her..she's the one who got me started on the show..prior to watching it this summer i had never watched it. that was the last episode i was going to see w/ her, waaaaHHhhhhhhhhh...bLeh..so yah, afterwards we went to eat dessert (me, linda, kristine, sdf, and lisa)..we sat at friday's for a good 2 hours, haha..she said her goodbyes to everyone & then i took her home..and then it was my turn to say goodbye..i could tell she was gonna cry if we stood there ne longer, as was i..i could feel the tears & it i held back..cuz if i started, so would she and it'd be a long sob fest...bLah!  i miss you soOooo soOOoo much kris!!!!!!! *mwaH*

thursday nite went to brian's apartment after dinner & watched tv...then all of us (me, brian, christine, mike & matt) went to cold stone around la jolla by the beach..walked along the beach afterwards & saw the seals..so cute!!    then went back to bri's apartment and just talked & watched tv..

friday nite went to brian's again..and i had rented starsky & hutch..so we watched that & i baked bri & matt brownies..mMmm mMmm goOood..  

saturday i ran errands, worked out, and then at nite went out w/ the group again..we ate dinner at california pizza kitchen..i ordered a carne asada pizza..it was good, i thought it mite be kinda weird at first but it was tasty..then we went to see garden state..we saw it at the la jolla theater..ghetto amc style..haha..no stadium seating but oh well..the movie was good, it better have been for 9 bucks, hahha..after that we went to Ralph's and got stuff to make our own pazookie (or however u spell that)...ooHhhh it was sooooo gooooood!! we ate those & watched tv..i had fun 

sunday was another errand day..went into work for a lil while..nothing too exciting..and later on at nite went to the mira mesa carnival..it was small, nothing fancy schmancy..but it was fun..too bad i felt sorta sick afterwards..hahaha..too many spinning up & down rides, acK!..but i had fun, i like the atmosphere of carnivals..afterwards went for a quick dinner & watched tv    

so that has been the last 2 weeks of my fun & adventurous life..haha, not..and tomorrow starts the routine week...woot woot!

HAPPY BIRTHDAY BRIAN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! whooo hoooo we're all old foggies now! hahaha :P 

it was a rather hectic day...had work of course, but i got off early cuz we were throwing bri a surprise bday party!! :)  exciting huh!? i was excited, haha..cuz i'd never thrown anyone a surprise birthday party. so it was a new thing for me, yay! :P  i think it went pretty well..since he was surprised & didn't suspect anything. me, mike & matt got to the apt early and decorated, got food, and then it was almost party time! we ate food from pat & oscar's (yummy!) and just watched tv & talked..then had some ice-cream cake, it was really good, mMmmm..o yah and bri opened presents before that too..he got a dvd player (from christie) & season 1 & 2 of friend's (from me, mike & matt). brian said how it was odd cuz doing that was so not like us..which is partially cuz we never really organize anything beforehand, it's almost always just the day of thing we decide to do...but this was a special occassion, hehe..and also cuz he said we never do anything for any of our birthday's usually, but i think that's cuz we've never really been all together for any of our birthday's..cept this year for mine which we didn't celebrate till the day after cuz it was father's day & i wasn't here, haha..but yah, last nite was fun :)

and weekend here i come!! whhheeee :P

WHoa..it's August already!! time sure flies by huh?  So i started my new job last monday..it's good: good pay, nice people, i like what i'm doing..it's good.  everything just is more hectic since i work till 5:30/6, n then come home around 6:30/7 from sitting in traffic..eat dinner, wait a lil and go work out..working out makes me even more tired than i am already, so i basically come home do some stuff for a lil while and hit the sack! WHAT AN EXCITING LIFE!!! haha not!..being an adult can sometimes suck..but it does have its upsides :P  

aside from work and working out last week..i hung out with ppl & that was fun! 

thurs - worked till a lil late that nite & then went to dinner at islands w/ bri, matt, and eileen..then went back to our usual hang out place (aka bri's apt..hehe) and played munchkin..haha, a very interesting and fun game..n then watched some korean movie, it was umm..violent n sorta weird..i wasn't really paying attn so i think i'll need to rewatch that sometime again..

fri - worked of course..got out a lil early & went to the del mar race track..that was fun & a new adventure..i'd never been to the race track to watch horse racing..i didn't bet ne money cuz i just wanted to watch & kinda get the hang of it..so i think i got how to bet down..i did "pretend" betting..hahaha..ghetto, yes i kno..but hey who cares?  after the races were over..i stayed to watch switchfoot (!!!!!!!!) play!!..it was FREE too, whoo hoo!!..well free w/ a paid admission to the races (which was only 5 bucks, that was very well worth it!)..i thought they were only gonna play 1 or 2 songs, but turns out they played 9 or 10 songs, so pretty much like an entire concert..they were awesome, i think they sounded better live than on the radio n such..the only bad thing about the concert was that stupid ppl thought they'd be kewl by throwing crap at ppl..*rawr* that wasn't very nice cuz ppl were getting hit by plastic bottles, race programs, money!! ugghh..some ppl should really grow up!..but other than that it was a good concert, i had fun! it was kinda early still, 9:30ish, so i ended up going to friday's for happy hour, yummmyy..sorta a long wait, but gooood food..i actually didnt eat appetizers this time, i think im sick of eating them since i've eaten them so much..haha..

sat - went to a picnic in mission beach..oOOo good fooood!!..they had carne asada to make ur own tacos, korean bbq, chicken, tons of desserts..pretty much a crapload of goood food..haha..later on went to dinner in hillcrest w/ matt & kristine..we ate at taste of thai (it was voted san diego's best thai food so we tried it out)..it was SOOO GOOD!!..and it was a good price for the amnt of food u got..so i recommed that to anyone who likes thai food. afterwards we went back to mira mesa to watch harold & kumar go to whitecastle...linda & jay joined us as well...haha that movie was so funny, stupid funny..but funny nonetheless..

sun - hung out with a friend i hadn't seen in a while..we went to hillcrest, and got some late lunch at corvette diner..very interesting i'd hafta say..they threw straws at us first off..n then at the end they threw gum at us..hahaha..it's their style..afterwards we walked around a good amnt, hehe..too bad i was wearing flip flops which made it a lot harder to walk that much..gRrr..ended up at a coffee shop, relaxed a lil and went back home..(thanx for visiting!!!)...got home, and a lil later headed to bri's apt w/ matt to eat some korean bbq!!! yummy in tummy yo! .. played some munchkin again..that game is interesting..oOo ooO i won again tonite!! cept for when we played a new type of munchkin game, bri one..but hopefully the pattern will contine: bri wins the first time we play a munchkin game (3 games)..n then from then on out i win..

..and that my friends is all i have time to write..goodnite
